title: Never Truth
description: "Fantastic, steamy, heart wrenching...NEVER TRUTH took my breath away and was positively worth the wait. Ramsower, I adore you and your mafia world. 5 Incredible Stars!" -Mandy, I Read Indie Book BlogNico broke my heart back when we were in high school.Imagine my surprise when he interrupts a mother-daughter lunch years later, only to find out he’s working for my father.Even worse, he’s been assigned as my new mafia bodyguard.And he’s got his sights set on more than keeping me safe…**Never Truth is the second book in The Five Families Series but can be read as a standalone novel.
author: Jill Ramsower
